00023 #include "xmlobjectlist.h"
00024 #include "globaluri.h"
00025 
00029 RainbruRPG::Core::xmlObjectList::xmlObjectList(){
00030   LOGI("Loading object list");
00031 
00032   RainbruRPG::Network::GlobalURI gu;
00033   std::string confStr= gu.getUserDirFile("objects.xml");
00034   this->filename=confStr.c_str();
00035   doc=NULL;
00036 
00037   meshList=new ObjectMeshList();
00038 
00039   // Loading the document
00040   doc=new TiXmlDocument( this->filename );
00041   doc->LoadFile();
00042   root =doc->RootElement();
00043 
00044   treatAllObjects();
00045   LOGI("Object list correctly loaded");
00046 }
00047 
00051 RainbruRPG::Core::xmlObjectList::~xmlObjectList(){
00052   // Deleting TinyXml object
00053   delete doc;
00054   doc=NULL;
00055 
00056   ObjectMeshList::const_iterator iter;
00057   for (iter=meshList->begin(); iter != meshList->end(); iter++){
00058     (*iter)->~ObjectMesh();
00059   }
00060 
00061   meshList->clear();
00062   delete meshList;
00063   meshList=NULL;
00064 }
00065 
00069 void RainbruRPG::Core::xmlObjectList::treatAllObjects(){
00070   if (root){
00071     TiXmlNode* childNode = root->FirstChild( "Object" );
00072     if (childNode){
00073       TiXmlElement* child= childNode->ToElement();
00074 
00075       for( child; child; child=child->NextSiblingElement() ){
00076         treatOneObject(child);
00077       }
00078     }
00079     else{
00080       LOGW("Empty object list");
00081     }
00082   }
00083   else{
00084     LOGW("Can not get a valid root element");
00085   }
00086 }
00087 
00093 void RainbruRPG::Core::xmlObjectList::treatOneObject(TiXmlElement* elem){
00094   const char* type=elem->Attribute("type");
00095   const char* name=elem->Attribute("name");
00096   const char* meshfile=elem->Attribute("meshfile");
00097 
00098   ObjectMesh* mesh=new ObjectMesh(name, meshfile);
00099   meshList->push_back(mesh);
00100 
00101   TiXmlNode* childNode = elem->FirstChild( "Pos" );
00102   if (childNode){
00103     TiXmlElement* child= childNode->ToElement();
00104 
00105     for( child; child; child=child->NextSiblingElement() ){
00106       treatOneMesh(child, mesh);
00107     }
00108   }
00109   else{
00110     LOGW("Empty Pos list");
00111   }
00112   mesh=NULL;
00113 }
00114 
00124 void RainbruRPG::Core::xmlObjectList::treatOneMesh( TiXmlElement* elem, 
00125                                                     ObjectMesh* mesh){
00126 
00127   double dx, dy, dz;
00128   double rw, rx, ry, rz;
00129 
00130   elem->QueryDoubleAttribute("x", &dx);
00131   elem->QueryDoubleAttribute("y", &dy);
00132   elem->QueryDoubleAttribute("z", &dz);
00133 
00134   elem->QueryDoubleAttribute("rw", &rw);
00135   elem->QueryDoubleAttribute("rx", &rx);
00136   elem->QueryDoubleAttribute("ry", &ry);
00137   elem->QueryDoubleAttribute("rz", &rz);
00138 
00139   std::string name=elem->GetText();
00140 
00141   ObjectPos pos;
00142   pos.setName(name);
00143   pos.setPosX(dx);
00144   pos.setPosY(dy);
00145   pos.setPosZ(dz);
00146 
00147   pos.setRotW(rw);
00148   pos.setRotX(rx);
00149   pos.setRotY(ry);
00150   pos.setRotZ(rz);
00151   mesh->addPos(pos);
00152 }
00153 
00161 ObjectMeshList* RainbruRPG::Core::xmlObjectList::getMeshList(){
00162   return meshList;
00163 }
00164 
00173 ObjectMesh* RainbruRPG::Core::xmlObjectList::
00174 getObjectMeshByName(std::string name){
00175 
00176   std::string omName;
00177   bool found=false;
00178 
00179   LOGI("getObjectMeshByName called :");
00180   LOGCATS("Object name :");
00181   LOGCATS(name.c_str());
00182   LOGCAT();
00183 
00184   ObjectMeshList::const_iterator iter;
00185   for (iter=meshList->begin(); iter != meshList->end(); iter++){
00186     omName=(*iter)->getName();
00187 
00188     // The given name was found
00189     if (omName.compare(name)==0){
00190       found=true;
00191       return (*iter);
00192     }
00193   }
00194 
00195   // No object found
00196   if (!found)
00197     return NULL;
00198 
00199 }
